smg.text: Mainly fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain later. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
